channel.title: Games on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Games on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: Google Sign in LibGDX
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to integrated google sign in in LibGDX. I assume that you are familiar with LibGDX, cross platform gaming framework. I’ll explain how integrate Google Sign in iOS. We’ll start with creating a new site with a very basic template. Then we’ll add in a few pages and posts. With small variations on that, you will be able to create many different types of web sites.
